Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I am using Heritirx with Bow to download html only relevant to a specific topic , I begin the crawl with 50 seeds  and it goes crawling fast  until  around 30 000 pages were downloaded (12 000 of them were true html pages) , after that it is going very very slow or  (it kept working for 12 hours on that rate and only 1000 documents were fetched) .
and It is not a  diskspace problem  .

Any advices are appreciated.
